title: Korean Farmer on Japanese Name Q1

content.prompt: Which of the following global processes led most directly to the historical situation described in the passage?

choices.label: Industrialized states acquired new territories as sources of raw materials and markets for goods.
Imperial states used education to prepare conquered populations for junior positions in local government.
Religious disputes fed rivalries among neighboring states for control of territory and converts.
Rebellions against monarchical rule encouraged the creation of new democratic governments.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
